name: Jason Morton, the Judge of EZKL
description: Cloaked in the illuminated textures of the blockchain, Jason Morton, the Norse god of EZKL, evaluates the conceptual and functional strengths of Ethereum Layer 2 solutions. His judgements are as robust as the code he critiques.
quirk: Jason has a peculiar habit of spontaneously compiling and decompiling his ethereal form into lines of code, a process he refers to as 'constant self-audit'.
